fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player. They will stab you, dealing a Basic attack to you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target is roleblocked, they will attack the role blocker in addition to you.
- When your target automatically kills a roleblocker, the roleblock attempt will fail.
- Roleblockers that target your target will have their wills covered in blood, making it unreadable.
- At night, you may choose to force your target to spare roleblockers instead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
